title: ISic001132. I.Sicily inscription 001132
body:
Facsimile Images

Δωρόθεος Λυσ[---]
Ἄνταλλος Νύμφ[ωνος]
ἀγορανομήσαν[τες]
Ἀφροδίται
5⟦ἐκ τοῦ δήμου⟧
γ̣ρ̣αμματεὺς
Ἀπολ̣λόδωρος Φαλάκρου

Apparatus criticus

Text of IGTermini

English translation

Dorotheos Lys [— — —] Antallos son of Nymphon who were agoranomoi to Aphrodite. [[by the people]] secretary (was) Apollodoros, son of Phalakros.

commentary
